title: Recipe Remake: Caffe Panna’s Red Flag
ingredients: Here’s What You’ll Need For 6 Pints:
1 ¼cup corn syrup, tapioca syrup, or maple syrup
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 325 and line a baking sheet with butter.
2.In a heated pot, add your butter and mix until browned.
3. Combine sugar and a pinch of salt and mix until a grainy texture forms. Then, add in your graham crackers!
4.Lay out on baking sheet and place in oven for 7-10 minutes.
1. Combine one cup of milk with cream cheese into a blender until it’s fully mixed in. Pour into ice cream maker.
2.Combine sugar, heavy cream, salt and remaining whole milk into ice cream machine.
3. Press start and let the magic happen!
4. Once it’s done, transfer to a bowl and allow to freeze for at least 3 hours.
5. Top with preserves and graham crunch and enjoy!
